comments:
Using the CDT debugger, an error screen pops up or program terminates when
attempting to step into a function that is passed a file stream.

A snip of code that will demonstrate this:

void addline (ofstream &fout) {
	fout <<"This is the first line\n";
}
int main() {
	ofstream fout ("outfile.txt");
	addline(fout);
	fout<<"file hello\n";
	fout.close();
	return (0);
}

Hoda,
  This a the same problem, i.e. the Openable/TranslationUnit only
can work with IFile i.e files that are located in the workspace.
Not always true, see the log.  Any ideas on this ?

This is fix in the head branch.

The Core Model WorkingCopy/Openable/TranslationUnit
blindly assume that the __must__ be in the workspace.

The fix is not quite right.  But we will have better
tools to deal with this in Eclipse-3.0
